00034 #ifndef RING_H
00035 #define RING_H
00036 
00037 #include <stdint.h>
00038 #include <stdbool.h>
00039 
00040 typedef uint16_t ring_index_t;
00041 typedef uint8_t *ring_buffer_t;
00042 typedef uint8_t ring_count_t;
00043 typedef uint8_t ring_size_t;
00044 typedef struct
00045 {
00046     ring_buffer_t buffer;
00047     ring_size_t size;
00048     ring_index_t head_index;
00049     ring_index_t tail_index;
00050     ring_count_t count;
00051 } ring_t;
00052

00228 /* ring buffer counter initialization */
00229 #define ring_free_count(r)      (((r)->size) - ((r)->count))
